item.description:
Learn everything there is to know about Type 6 and relating to 6s, perfects for 6s, anyone in relationship with or formerly in relationship with a 6 and anyone curious about understanding Type 6, one of the more complex types to understand. 

 

$40, sliding scale if needed to $40-20.

7:30-9:30pm

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert, having taught well over 2000 workshops on this topic in the last 22 years. He is an Enneagram coach and therapist, workshop leader, trainer of personality types in groups and organizations and author of 2 books, The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living. He is writing an Advanced Enneagram book which will be out this summer. 

If you want to organize a workshop for your group or organization using the Enneagram to understand personality types, please give a call.

781 648 3737

herb@herbpearce.com

www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Relating to Type 6s, The Security Seeker
